resources.string: Welcome to Codigo Plataforma the app. Please use your username and password to Login into app or Signup.
Create a username and password to sign up or sign up using Google or Facebook.
Here students take their foot into the learning environment to gather new skills that makes them the future’s software developer.
Learn with bunch of other student and advance in your field. Learn about projects, placements, contests and much more.
Build projects and stay ahead of the game. Struck somewhere? No worries, you’ve got a community to help discuss your queries and issues.
